ComponentDefinition.LayoutDefinition:
<![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <LayoutDefinition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
<Layout Name="Master" Type="RootLayout">
<Prolog>
<Value><asp:Content id="PageTitleContent_PlaceHolderPageTitle" ContentPlaceHolderID="PlaceHolderPageTitle" runat="server"> <asp:Literal id="PageTitle" runat="server" text="ViewpointXRef" /> </asp:Content> <asp:Content id="PageTitleContent_PlaceHolderMain" ContentPlaceHolderID="PlaceHolderMain" runat="server"> <BaseClasses:ScrollCoordinates id="ScrollCoordinates1" runat="server"></BaseClasses:ScrollCoordinates> <BaseClasses:BasePageSettings id="PageSettings" runat="server"></BaseClasses:BasePageSettings> <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">{ScriptDirectionTemplate}</script>
</Value> </Prolog> <Row> <Cell> <Value><asp:ContentPlaceHolder id="PageContent" Runat="server"/></Value> </Cell> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <Value><GEN:FOOTER NAME="PageFooter"/></Value> </Cell> </Row> <Epilog>
<Value></asp:Content></Value> </Epilog>
<TableAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>width</Name> <AttributeValue>100%</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellpadding</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellspacing</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileBase</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </TableAttributes>
</Layout>
</LayoutDefinition>]]>
